name: walkietalkie
description: Allows for tuning to frequency channels and talking via walkie walkies for long-ranged communication when in a minigame
author: astrsk

commands.name: w
commands.description: chat using your walkie talkie on a selected frequency
commands.example: /w the quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog

args.name: message
args.description: message to send out across the airwaves
